macros.title: Return::Marketplace::Received:: Amazon Lost Claim Refund
macros.description: when refunds are submitted for lost claims

actions.value:
Hello,

Thank you for contacting Customer Service.

Your package should have arrived by now and we apologize that you have not received it. A refund was submitted for the order you did not receive. Please allow 24-48 hours for the refund to be processed back to your original method of payment. You may repurchase via Amazon.com if you wish to receive the item. 

Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.


Best regards,
Customer Service

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service. 


 We currently do not have confirmation that the package has arrived to our fulfillment center. This generally means that the package is still in transit or has not been logged into our returns department. Returns usually take 3 to 5 business day to process from the date the package arrives. To further assist you, please provide us with the return tracking number so that we can attempt to locate the package. 



Thank you, 
Customer Service
channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service. 

Our fulfillment center is located in Miami, FL. The impact of Hurricane Irma has caused extensive damage across the southeast, preventing timely delivery of parcel nationwide. At this time shipping carriers have delayed deliveries until government officials declare the roadways safe to travel again. Due to the unknown ETA of when the carriers will be able to resume their normal delivery route, we strongly suggest waiting until after 9/18/2017 to return the item to ensure the package is received without incident.


Thank you,
Customer Service

actions.value:
Hello,

Thank you for contacting Customer Service.  

Your return has been received and the refund has been submitted for processing. Please allow 24-48 business hours for the refund to be processed back to your original method of payment. Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance. 


Thank you, 
Customer Service

Hello,


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


Unfortunately, we are only able to provide a refund for items returned. You may return the device for a full refund and repurchase the item you need via Amazon.com. Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.



Sincerely,

Customer Service

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting customer service.


Your return order has been received and is currently being processed. All returns are processed within 3-5 business days upon receipt then updated accordingly. Once the return is processed, you will receive an email confirmation with an update as requested.


Thank you,
Customer service

actions.value:
{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

We have received your return and it has been processed. A replacement order has been created for you. Please allow 24-48 hours for the order to be processed and shipped. Your reference number for this order is as follows:

( INSERT SO NUMBER) 

Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns. 

Thank you,
Customer service

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Thank you for contacting Customer Service,

An electronic prepaid label will be provided via a separate email within 48 business hours. Please print the return label attach it to the shipping box and take the package to your nearest UPS Shipping facility. Once you take the package to your nearest UPS facility, they will return the item to us. Please let us know if you have any additional questions or concerns.

Best regards,
Customer Service

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.  


Your return has been received and processed. Unfortunately we do not have the item in stock to send you a replacement. We have submitted a full refund for your order and please allow 24-48 hours for the refund to be processed back to your original method of payment. Please feel free to contact us again if we can be of any further assistance.



Thank you, 
Customer Service

actions.value:
Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Our warehouse has just advised that the original device you sent to us is unfortunately no longer available and not in stock. 

Please see the replacement options we have offered below you can google search each item for pictures and information and once you select one of the options below we will have it shipped out within 24-48 business hours:


Your patience and understanding is greatly appreciated,
CCR Warranty

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},



Thank you for contacting Customer Service,


We are sorry to hear your item arrived in unsatisfactory condition and are happy to assist you with requesting a return via Amazon.com. The steps below will instruct you on how to receive your authorization to return the item and a prepaid label.



On your Desktop/Mobile device:


  • Select Orders
  • Locate the order for the item you would like to return
  • Select "Return or replace items'
  • Check the box of the exact item you would like to return,
  • Once the item has been selected, you will be prompted to select your reason for returning the item. Please select the reason the best relates to your reason for the return and include comments in the comments field.
  • Select "Continue"
  • Select the option to receive a refund for your return. You will have the option to receive a full refund back to your original method of payment or Amazon account balance.
  • Select "Continue" to receive your prepaid label and confirm your return.



Please let us know if you have any additional questions or concerns.



Best regards,

Customer Service

macros.title: Return::Marketplace::Amazon Return Request Instructions for FULLY UNLOCKED DEVICES

actions.value:
{{ticket.requester.first_name}},



Thank you for contacting Customer Service,


We greatly apologize that you are experiencing issues with the device purchased and are happy to assist you with requesting a return via Amazon.com. The item received should work with both CDMA and GSM carriers as described but may be defective. The steps below will instruct you on how to receive your authorization to return the item and a prepaid label.



On your Desktop/Mobile device:


  • Select Orders
  • Locate the order for the item you would like to return
  • Select "Return or replace items'
  • Check the box of the exact item you would like to return,
  • Once the item has been selected, you will be prompted to select your reason for returning the item. Please select the reason the best relates to your reason for the return and include comments in the comments field.
  • Select "Continue"
  • Select the option to receive a refund for your return. You will have the option to receive a full refund back to your original method of payment or Amazon account balance.
  • Select "Continue" to receive your prepaid label and confirm your return.



Please let us know if you have any additional questions or concerns.



Best regards,

Customer Service

macros.title: Return::Marketplace::UPS Prepaid Label Unable To Print
macros.description: Please use the Macro for customers who have received their UPS link but cannot print.

actions.value:
{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Thank you for contacting Customer Service.

Please click the link provided for your prepaid label, then click on the GET MOBILE CODE button under the print label button. This will send a mobile code to your phone that you can then provide to UPS to print in the store for you. Please let us know if we can be of any further assistance.


Best regards,
Customer Service

value: channel:all

Hello,


Thank you for contacting us.


We apologize that you have received your item in unsatisfactory condition and are happy to assist you in resolving this issue. Your satisfaction is our top priority and to not cause you any further inconvenience, you do not need to return the defective item to us and we have submitted a full refund for the order. Please allow 24-48 hours for the refund to be posted to your account and please let us know if you need any further assistance or have any additional questions or concerns. 


Thank you,
Customer service
channel:all

Hello,


Thank you for contacting customer service. 


We are sorry to hear your order has not been received. We have reviewed the tracking information which shows the package was undelivered and the package is being returned to sender. Upon receipt of the package a full refund will be submitted to (Amazon/eBay). Please reference return order RMA-(        ) for the return if you would like to contact us for status.


Thank you,
Customer service

actions.value:
Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Thank you for contacting Customer Service regarding your request for a return.

In order to process your exchange, we will need the correct IMEI number(s).

BLU devices have more than one IMEI, which can be located either on the outside of the box or on the back of the phone behind the battery. 

Please provide us with both IMEI numbers.

Awaiting your prompt reply,
Customer Service

Hello {{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},

Thank you for contacting Customer Service regarding your request for a return.

The IMEI number {{ticket.ticket_field_114094135553}} you provided does not match our records. Please provide us with the correct IMEI number, which is located on the back of your device, usually behind the battery. 

If you are able to turn your device on, you may also dial *#06# on the keypad to obtain the IMEI number. 

Awaiting your reply,
CCR Warranty

Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Thank you for contacting Customer Service regarding your request for a return. 

We regret to inform you that the warranty for your device does not cover physical damage. At this point, your request to return the merchandise has been denied. We suggest taking your device to a local service repair company in your area to assist you. In addition, you may consider contacting your carrier to determine if there is any additional insurance coverage. 

Please accept our apologies, and we hope that you can find a solution.

Kindest regards,
CCR Warranty

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.

We are sorry to hear your item arrived in unsatisfactory condition and are happy to assist. We have created a return authorization for you to ship the item back to us. Your Return Merchandise Authorization number and return address has been generated as follows:


A return label will be sent in a separate message within 2 business days


***The return may be delayed or denied for the following reasons. To avoid any delays, please review instructions carefully and let us know if you have any questions***

· Personal information still on device

· Personal locks or iCloud/Google accounts still on device

· Physical Damage

· Item returned was not original item purchased


*****VERY IMPORTANT*****

ANDROID DEVICES


  • It is important that you remove your Google Account Prior to completing a factory reset on your device. If you do not complete this step it will delay your return. This will activates the "Factory Reset Protection" which can only be removed by entering in your email address and password manually into the device. You can read about it here:
    • https://www.androidcentral.com/factory-reset-protection-what-you-need-know
  • How to securely remove all your information from your device:
    • https://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-wipe-your-phone-or-tablet-before-selling/

For Android/Google Play Store: https://security.google.com/settings/security/activity


APPLE DEVICES


  • It is important that you remove your Apple ID from your phone and your device from iTunes and "Find my iPhone"
    • https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204074
    • https://support.apple.com/kb/PH2702?locale=en_US

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


Before you return your device:


  • The return may be delayed or denied if the device is received with your personal information attached. Once denied, you will be responsible for providing a pre-paid return label to E1 Wireless in order to receive the item back and remove the information manually.


  • Please be sure to remove your memory card and SIM Card


How to ship the device:

  • Please write the the RMA number on a sheet of paper and place inside the box.


  • Please write the RMA clearly on the outside of the shipping box. Do not tape or write anything on the item or the original manufacturer's carton.


  • In the returned package, be sure to return everything you received with the item for a full refund or exchange. However, please do not include any accessories you purchased separately with your return such as cases, headphones etc.

Your RMA number (({{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}})) is valid for 15 days. Once the return arrives it takes 3-5 business days to process. A full refund or replacement will be awarded as requested. If the requested replacement is no longer in stock, a full refund will be provided. Item must be received by E1 Wireless before replacement or refund is processed


ATTENTION:
Warranty is only for manufacturer defects, Warranty does not cover physical damage such as broken or cracked plastics, cracked screen/ LCD damage and/or water damage.

If the device returned is found to have sustained any physical or water damage, your claim for return will be denied. Once denied, you will be responsible for providing a pre-paid return label to E1 Wireless in order to receive the item back to repair locally.

Please have your RMA number ready if you need to contact us by email or phone to check the status of your return.
Please return your item to the address below:

{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}

E1 Wireless

{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}

20000 NE 15th Ct

Miami FL, 33179



Best regards,
Customer Service

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


We have received your return and it has been processed. Unfortunately we are currently out of stock of your original device but have compiled a list of comparable available replacement options for you.

actions.value:
Hello,


Thank you for contacting Customer Service regarding the exchange of your device.


Below is a link required to complete your request for a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA). Please click on the link which will redirect you to an online form. Complete the form to its entirety and hit submit.

**Please note this form should be completed on a computer and may not work properly if completed from a phone or tablet**


Upon receipt of the online form, you can expect to receive an email from us within 2 business days with the RMA number and return shipping instructions. Once we receive your merchandise, Exchanges are processed within 3-5 business days from receipt of your merchandise and completion of our quality warranty inspection.


Click here for RMA Form


Please be sure to include a brief note of the issue with your return.


Thank you,

CCR Warranty

Hello,


**A prepaid return label will be sent to you in a separate email after you receive the RMA instructions, for you to send the item back at no cost the next business day. Please print the return label attach it to the shipping box and take the package to your nearest UPS Shipping facility. Once you take the package to your nearest UPS facility, they will return the item to us.**


Below is a link required to complete your request for a Return Merchandise Authorization (RMA). Please click on the link which will redirect you to an online form. Complete the form to its entirety and hit submit.

**Please note this form should be completed on a computer and may not work properly if completed from a phone or tablet**


Upon receipt of the online form, you can expect to receive an email from us within 2 business days with the RMA number and return shipping instructions. Once we receive your merchandise, Exchanges are processed within 3-5 business days from receipt of your merchandise and completion of our quality warranty inspection.


Click here for RMA Form



Please be sure to include a brief note of the issue with your return.



Thank you,

Customer Service

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Your Return Merchandise Authorization number has been generated. Please use the information below to ship us the unit.

Your RMA number is valid for 15 days, Return Order (INSERT RMA HERE)

CTJ
3919 Hickory Hill Rd
Memphis, TN 38115
Attn: Jack Mekaloun / Julia Popovich

In order to process your request with no delays please be sure to adhere to the following:
Write the RMA clearly on the outside of the shipping box. Please remove all of the accounts and pass codes  linked to your phone. 

Remove the Memory Card and SIM Card
Please remove screen locks or password the item may have, this way our technicians can access the item.  However, please do not include any accessories with your return such as cases, headphones etc... Be sure to remove your memory card and SIM Card as well as any screen locks or passwords that may currently be enabled on the device so that our technicians do not have any difficulties accessing it.
If you have an iPhone with IOS 7 or a phone with Android 4.3, go to your iCloud or Samsung account and remove the cell phone from the account registered. Phone may be denied if not removed.  
Exchanges are processed within 3-5 business days from receipt of your merchandise and completion of our quality warranty inspection.    

If you have any questions or concerns feel free to respond to this email.

Please have your RMA number ready when you email us to check the status.

Thank you,
Customer Service

actions.value:

You may want to take your device to a local service repair company in your area to assist you. In addition, you may consider contacting your carrier to determine any insurance coverage. 

Please accept our apologies, and we hope you can find a solution.

Thank you,

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Thank you for contacting customer service. 

We currently do not offer international shipping and only ship within the United States. There is an option to ship internationally through eBay and there global shipping program.

Breed Customer Service

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


We are sorry to hear your item was damaged in transit and are happy to contact the shipping carrier to file a claim. To do so, we ask that you complete our Damage Package Form.


Below is a link required to open a claim with the shipping carrier. Please click on the link and it will redirect you to the online form.


Order ID: {{ticket.ticket_field_60033867}}

Tracking Number: {{ticket.ticket_field_114094207993}}


[Click here for Lost/Damaged Claim form](https://formcrafts.com/a/shipmentclaims)


This form is similar to an affidavit, where your signature will serve as an acknowledgment that the merchandise was damaged upon receipt. This will allow us to dispute the damage of the item with the carrier.


Once the form is received and reviewed, a refund will be issued if it meets requirements.


**Please note a valid phone number is required by the shipping carrier in order to open the claim. Resolution may be delayed or denied if a valid number is not provided**


Please feel free to contact us again if we can be of any further assistance.


Kindest Regards,

Customer Service

actions.value:
Hello,


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


Renewed products are pre-owned devices. Although not certified by the manufacturer, the devices have been inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers. These devices are professionally inspected and tested to work like new however the device may have minor cosmetic wear such as minimal light scratches on the screen and minor imperfections on sides and/or back. Items may be received in generic packaging and will only include relevant accessories (headphones are NOT included). Our Renewed conditioned devices are backed by the 90-day Amazon Renewed Guarantee. Please let us know if you need any additional information as we are happy to assist you.


Thank you,
Customer Service

macros.title: General Inquiries:: Certified Refurbished, Good Condition Program Description

actions.value:
Hello.


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


Amazon Renewed is offering “Good Condition” phones that are fully tested to be 100% functional. This Certified Refurbished - Good Condition product has gone through an 18 point inspection process and is backed by the same minimum 90-day warranty as the “Excellent Condition” phones. “Good Condition” phones differ from “Excellent Condition” phones because of small scratches on the phone casing.


The product may also have been used longer but the screen will be in good condition. Both “Excellent” and “Good” Condition phones come with generic accessories that are not directly from the Manufacturer. All sellers are listed as New for this product due to Amazon's Certified Refurbished- Good Condition regulations however, all items listed are previously owned.


Please let us know if you need any additional information as we are happy to assist you.



Thank you,

Customer Service

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting us,


We are sorry to hear you have experienced an issue with your order and are happy to provide assistance. To better assist you, please provide us with your order ID number so that we can locate your order and provide you with a satisfactory resolution.


Promptly awaiting your reply,
Customer service
channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting us,

actions.value:
Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},

Unfortunately, we currently do not offer Prepaid return shipping labels. The return shipping costs for replacement items are the responsibility of the customer. We are the warranty company and are not contracted to provide prepaid labels. We will however ship the item back to you at no cost. 

Once your return has been received, it will be processed in a timely manner. 

Thank you,
CCR Warranty

value: channel:all

{{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting us,

As a large seller we have a mixed inventory from many vendors and manufacturers; Some of the units will be in original packaging and others will be generic packaging. Thank you,

actions.value:
Hello {{ticket.requester.first_name}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


We are sorry to hear that the product you purchased has to be returned. To assist you, a return merchandise authorization {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} has been created.


Return Merchandise Authorization Instructions


Please follow the instructions below to ensure the prompt resolution of your return.


If you are returning any Cellphones, Tablets or Watches, it is extremely important to completely remove ALL accounts, ALL pass-codes, and ALL personal information from the device before you return it. If you are no longer able to power on the device, please use one of the links below to remove your personal information remotely. A simple reset of the device DOES NOT erase your information.


IMPORTANT: Any device(s) received locked with your information will be denied, returned at your expense with no exchange submitted for processing.


1. Remove ALL passwords from the device

o Screen Locks

o Account locks

o Any other passwords


2. Go to the cloud or account and remove the device from your account


For APPLE: To remotely prepare your Apple device for the return please visit:


https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204074

https://support.apple.com/kb/PH2702?locale=en_US


For Android: To remotely prepare your Android device for the return please visit:


https://www.cnet.com/how-to/how-to-wipe-your-phone-or-tablet-before-selling/

https://security.google.com/settings/security/activity


3. Remove your memory card and/or SIM card.


4. Please return your item to the address below:


CCR Warranty

{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}

20000 NE 15th Ct

Miami FL, 33179


5. ATTENTION:


  • Warranty is only for manufacturer defects, Warranty does not cover physical damage such as broken or cracked plastics, cracked screen/ LCD damage and/or water damage.​


  • Customers are responsible for obtaining a shipping label and any costs associated with preparing the return for shipment to CCR Warranty (i.e labels, boxes, envelopes, etc.).


  • Please write the RMA clearly on the outside of the shipping box. Do not tape or write anything on the item or the original manufacturer's carton.


  • In the returned package, be sure to ONLY return the defective device with the charger and battery. Please DO NOT include any accessories with your return such as cases, headphones, etc. If anything other than the device, charger, and battery is received it will be discarded.


  • We only exchange the defective device for the same make/model purchased. We do not repair devices.


  • As the warranty company for your preferred retailer, we DO NOT have the ability to provide a refund for any reason, under any circumstances. If you desire to receive a refund please contact your Point of Sale for further assistance.


If the device returned is found to be locked with your information or has sustained any physical or water damage, your return will be denied. Once denied, you will be responsible for providing a pre-paid return label to CCR Warranty in order to receive the item back.


Please have your {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} ready if you need to contact us by email or phone to check the status of your return at 1-866-603-0638.


Best regards,

Customer Service


*By returning your device, you are agreeing to the terms indicated above*

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Thank you for contacting Customer Service.


We have added an addtional 15 days to the current RMA.


{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}



CCR Warranty

{{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}}

20000 NE 15th Ct

Miami FL, 33179




Best regards,
Customer Service

Please be advised that the warranty only covers manufacturer defects of the device and does not cover any physical damage such as cracked screen, water damages, scratches wear and tear etc,. If the device is received and found to have any of the mentioned discrepancies, the warranty is automatically voided.  All exchanged/ returned merchandise must be in original factory packaging, including all packaging materials, inserts and manuals, warranty cards (not filled-out) and all accessories. We reserve the right to refuse any such items. Item must be received by BREED before replacement or refund is processed. 

Please feel free to contact us again if we can be of any further assistance.

channel:all

Customer Name,

Re: RMA-

We have received the                you sent in.  
It is our goal to ensure your return is handled in a timely manner.  Unfortunately we are unable access the phone because it was sent in with the passcode still on the device.  
Please send us the passcode so that we may access the device and process your return as soon as possible. 
 If you do not know the code to unlock the device or we are unable to unlock the device within 15 days, we request that you send us a shipping label so that we can send the item back to you.

channel:all

Customer Name,

Re: RMA-

We have received the [insert phone model] you sent in.  
We regret to inform you that the return for your device has been denied due to physical damage.  Your device was found to have [insert physical damage]

In order to send your device back to you, we request that you send us a shipping label within 15 days.  If the shipping label is not received within 15 days we will dispose of the device and the return will not be processed.  

Once you receive your device, we suggest taking your device to a local service repair company in your area to assist you. In addition, you may consider contacting your carrier to determine if there is any additional insurance coverage. 

Please accept our apologies, and we hope that you can find a solution.

Thank you,
Customer Service

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Initial Email - Personal Code

actions.value:
{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your device still has a personal code on it. As per our return instructions, this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, we need to be able to unlock your device completely and we can accomplish this by either one of these options:


OPTION 1: Providing us the passcode so that we may unlock the device and clear it back to factory settings


OPTION 2: Provide us a shipping label so that we can send the device back to you to unlock it and clear it without needing to provide us your personal code.

• We recommend using a carrier that can provide you a tracking number such as USPS or UPS.

• If you choose this method, you can upload the label electronically to this email.


Once this is complete, if you provide us the passcode, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you

Customer Service

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your phone still is connected to your iTunes account. As per our return instructions this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, you will need to remove the device from your iTunes account.


Below you will find a link that will walk you through how to do this from your computer:

For Apple/iTunes Accounts: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204074


Once you have removed your device from your iTunes account, please reply to this email and we will attempt to clear the device within 1 business day.


We will provide an update once this is complete and if successful will complete your return.



If we do not receive a response from you by:{{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}} , then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed

We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your phone's security features were activated due to a "hard reset" or "erase my iPhone" through icloud.com. Now, the device is in "activation lock" mode which was automatically enable due a wrong reset. We will need both the Apple ID and password to properly reset the device and move on with the return process in a timely manner.


We will need both the Email ID and password to properly reset the device and move on with the return process in a timely manner.

1. nonameatnonamedotcom (spell it out)

2. noname AT domainname . com (spacing)



-OR-

Please contact us at your earliest convenience to resolve your return. You can contact us at 1-866-603-0640 Monday through Friday 9 a.m. until 5 p.m. Easter Standard time.



If we do not receive a response from you by:{{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}} , then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed

actions.value:
{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your phone still is connected to your Google Account.

As per our return instructions this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, we need to be able to unlock your device completely and we can accomplish this by either:

  • Providing us the email and password for this account.
    • If you choose this method, we recommend immediately changing your password to something new once the return is completed
  • Provide us a shipping label so that we can send the device back to you to unlock it and clear it without needing to provide us your personal code.
    • We recommend using a carrier that can provide you a tracking number such as USPS or UPS.
    • If you choose this method, you can upload the label electronically to this email.





Once this is complete, if you provide us the passcode, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.



If we do not receive a response from you by:{{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}} , then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed



Thank you

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Final Email - Personal Code

actions.value: Final Notice: Problem with your return [IMPORTANT]

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We previously sent you several emails regarding your return. We have been unable to process your return as it was received with a personal code that is preventing us from resetting the device normally. As per our return instructions, this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, we need to be able to unlock your device completely and we can accomplish this by either one of these options:


OPTION 1: Providing us the passcode so that we may unlock the device and clear it back to factory settings


OPTION 2: Provide us a shipping label so that we can send the device back to you to unlock it and clear it without needing to provide us your personal code.

• We recommend using a carrier that can provide you a tracking number such as USPS or UPS.

• If you choose this method, you can upload the label electronically to this email.


Once this is complete, if you provide us the passcode, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you

Customer Service

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Final Email - Remove from iTunes

actions.value:
{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We have received your return. Upon inspection, we have determined that your phone still is connected to your iTunes account. As per our return instructions this is an important step to ensure your return is processed in a timely manner.


In order to proceed with the return, you will need to remove the device from your iTunes account.


Below you will find a link that will walk you through how to do this from your computer:

For Apple/iTunes Accounts: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204074


Once you have removed your device from your iTunes account, please reply to this email and we will attempt to clear the device within 1 business day.


We will provide an update once this is complete and if successful will complete your return.



If we do not receive a response from you by:{{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}} , then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed



Thank you

Customer Service

macros.title: Non-Conformed :: Customer Communication :: Final Email - Google Account

actions.value: Final Notice: Problem with your return [IMPORTANT]

{{ticket.ticket_field_114094139134}},


Re: {{ticket.ticket_field_72288387}} / {{ticket.ticket_field_114094157113}}


We previously sent you several emails regarding your return. We have been unable to process your return as it was received with an active Google Account.


In order to proceed with the return, we need to be able to unlock your device completely and we can accomplish this by either one of these options:


OPTION 1: By giving us a call at 1-866-603-0638 or 1-866-603-0640 Monday through Friday from 9:00 am until 5:00 pm EST.


OPTION 2: Provide us a shipping label so that we can send the device back to you to unlock it and clear it without needing to provide us your Google account email and password.

• We recommend using a carrier that can provide you a tracking number such as USPS or UPS.

• If you choose this method, you can upload the label electronically to this email.


Once this is complete, if you provide us the password for the Apple ID account, we will confirm that it is complete and the return processed.


If you send us a shipping label, we will confirm when the item has been packed up and sent back to you.


If we do not receive a response from you by {{ticket.ticket_field_114094818293}}, then your return will be closed out and no refund/exchange will be processed


Thank you
